Mike Tyson: Discipline is doing what you hate to do, but nonetheless doing it like you love it
Arnold Schwarzenegger: For me, life is continuously being hungry. The meaning of life is not simply to exist to survive but to move ahead, to go up, to achieve, to conquer.
Muhammad Ali: I don’t count my sit ups; I only start counting when it hurts because they’re the only ones that count
Anon: If you want to be the best you have to work harder than anybody else
Walt Disney: The Way Get Started Is To Quit Talking And Begin Doing.
Winston Churchill: The Pessimist Sees Difficulty In Every Opportunity. The Optimist Sees Opportunity In Every Difficulty.
Marcus Aurelius: Each day provides its own gifts
Henry David Thoreau: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
Vidal Sassoon: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
Pablo Picasso: Action is the foundational key to all success.
